title: Cherry chocolate chip cookies
ingredients: ['280g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '110g unsalted butter, softened', '110g margarine', '100g caster sugar', '110g dark brown soft sugar', '2 eggs', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 1/2 teaspoons almond extract', '150g dried cherries', '90g chopped walnuts', '60g chopped pecans', '340g chocolate chips or buttons']
